title: Embroidery Sample, 1775–1805
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic wire, sequins, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Formal floral pattern embroidered with silver and gold wire, green and gold sequins and glass beads on a bright red velvet ground with dots of gold in the ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, 1775–1805.
1775–1805. Medium: silk, metallic wire, sequins, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-61.
